hero.h1: Connect through sport with peers at your level
hero.subhead: A private members club for founders, operators, and VCs in London and New York. Small groups. Clear talk. Strong ties that last.
hero.emotionalLine: You push hard. You want people from your circle who can keep up and care. We help you find each other and choose the right meets.
hero.proof: Invite only. Verified roles. Quiet by design.

whatItIs.title: What it is
whatItIs.body: A self-serve members club that uses sport to form real ties. The app suggests the right people, time windows, and nearby spots. You decide and add the hold to your calendar.

whatItIsNot.title: What it is not
items: No hosts and no hard sells

who.title: Who we serve
who.body: You run a company, a fund, or both. Your time is tight and you train most weeks. You want peers from your high-quality ecosystem. You like small rooms and clear plans.
bullets: VC-backed founders from pre-seed to growth
Senior operators who own hard problems
VCs, angels, and fund partners who stay active

problem.title: The problem
problem.body: You meet many people. Few match your pace, your hours, or your drive. Big rooms drain energy. Plans fade when calendars collide.

promise.title: The promise
promise.body: Meet the right two people this month from your circle. Train together. Share what matters. Leave with a clear next step. Keep the tie alive with light prompts.

items.headline: Connection first
items.copy: We focus on people and fit. Sport is the way in, not the end.

items.headline: Tiny groups
items.copy: 1:1 or triads lead to direct talk and easy plans.

items.headline: Self-serve and fast
items.copy: The app proposes. You confirm. One tap adds a hold to your calendar.

items.headline: Local and time-matched
items.copy: Level, time windows, and short travel radius keep meets smooth.

items.headline: Invite-only and quiet
items.copy: Verified roles and clear norms. No pitches and no noise.

how.title: How it works
steps: Set sport, level, time windows, and travel zones
Pick a target cadence: 3 to 5 meets per month
Get weekly suggestions for people and slots
Tap to add a calendar hold and confirm in the app
Meet, log a quick note, and get a prompt to reconnect
how.note: Works with Google or Apple Calendar. Reads Strava on request to set pace bands.

items.name: Curation
items.body: Invite-only with real-name checks and trusted refs. A high bar keeps time clean.

items.name: Matching
items.body: Person fit and role first. Sport, level, time, area, and topics tune the match.

items.name: Suggestion Engine
items.body: Fresh proposals each week. Clear reasons. Easy accept or pass. Your choices train the system.

items.name: Rituals
items.body: City playbooks give default days and spots. You meet at public tracks, parks, and partner gyms when useful.

items.name: Memory
items.body: Light notes, last met, and next touch. You keep ties warm without extra work.

items.name: Privacy
items.body: Your data stays private. You control contact sharing and visibility. No social media noise.

matching.title: Matching that respects your time
matching.body: We score person fit first. Role, stage, and topics set the tone. We confirm sport and level so the session flows. We respect your time windows and travel zones. We favor triads so a late cancel still leaves a strong 1:1.
matching.note: You can pass with one tap. Passes teach the system.

rituals.title: Rituals you can count on
rituals.body: Set city rhythms make planning easy. The app suggests these slots. You choose if they fit your week.

london.name: London
list: Sat 8:00 Long run in Richmond Park or ride to Box Hill

ny.name: New York
list: Tue 7:00 Track at East River Park
Sat 8:00 Hudson River tempo or Central Park loops

rituals.note: We suggest public spots first. Partner gyms appear when they add value.

gatherings.title: Quarterly city gatherings
gatherings.body: Once a quarter we open a simple evening meet for members of your city. No stage and no agenda. Meet people you trained with and set your next month in motion.

signals.title: Member recognition
signals.intro: Members can spot each other in the wild. All signals are opt-in.

items.name: Glyph
items.body: A small mark on a cap or tee. Subtle and clean.

items.name: Band
items.body: A slim wrist band with a city color and tiny pace dots.

items.name: Lace tag
items.body: A small tag on a shoe lace with optional NFC for check-in and referrals.

items.name: Wallet pass
items.body: Add a pass for quick ID at gatherings.

signals.note: You can turn signals on or off anytime.

kit.title: Member kit
kit.body: New members can order a small starter kit. Discreet gear you can wear any day. No loud brand.
list: Slim wrist band with city color

trust.title: Trust and norms
trust.intro: This is a quiet space for people who value time and respect.
bullets: Invite only. Each member can sponsor one person per month
Proof of role with LinkedIn or an investor ref
No pitching. On time. No photos without consent
Public spots and partner gyms only. Safety first
Private by default. You control contact share and recognition mode
A simple reliability signal rewards steady show-ups

cities.title: Cities and plans
cities.intro: Start in your city. Swap to the other city when you travel.
cities.microcopy: Membership covers the service. Public spots are free. Any extras stay at cost.

funds.title: For funds
funds.body: Give your founders a steady way to meet real peers. Portfolio mode proposes small meets near your office. GPs, partners, and founders train together and keep ties warm across companies.

quotes.text: I met a GP and a CTO at the track. We now meet every four weeks.
quotes.name: Sarah

quotes.text: The suggestions match my level and time windows. Zero fuss.
quotes.name: Marcus

quotes.text: The triad format just works. Strong talk in 60 minutes.
quotes.name: Emma

qa.q: Is this a gym or a venue?
qa.a: No. It is a members club with a self-serve app. We suggest people, times, and spots. You choose.
No. We suggest public tracks and parks first and show partner gyms when useful.
1:1 or triads. That size keeps plans simple and talk sharp.
The target is 3 to 5 meets per month. Quality over count.
Running, strength, and rowing first. Boxing and rides next as we add spots.
No. It stays private by default. You choose what to share and with whom.
Yes. Portfolio mode supports private pods for funds in each city.

finalCta.title: Ready to connect through sport
finalCta.body: Apply now. We review new members each week. We keep a high bar so the room stays right.

seo.title: Self-serve members club for founders, operators, and VCs in London and New York
seo.description: Invite-only 1:1 and triad meets that spark real ties through sport. Smart suggestions. City rhythms. Quarterly gatherings. Apply for London or New York.
